chart.name: Agent not running
chart.programText: A = data('k8s.pod.phase', filter=filter('k8s.pod.name', 'cilium-*') and (filter('k8s.pod.phase', 'Pending') or filter('k8s.pod.phase', 'Failed') or filter('k8s.pod.phase', 'Unknown'))).count().publish(label='Agent not running')

chart.name: Agent Running
chart.programText: B = data('k8s.pod.phase', filter=filter('k8s.pod.name', 'cilium-*') and filter('k8s.pod.phase', 'Running')).count().publish(label='Agent running')

chart.name: DNS Proxy running
chart.programText: F = data('k8s.pod.phase', filter=filter('k8s.pod.name', 'cilium-dnsproxy-*') and filter('k8s.pod.phase', 'Running')).count().publish(label='DNS Proxy running', color='yellow')

chart.name: Operator Running
chart.programText: D = data('k8s.pod.phase', filter=filter('k8s.pod.name', 'cilium-operator-*') and filter('k8s.pod.phase', 'Running')).count().publish(label='Operator running', color='blue')

chart.name: DNS Proxy not running
chart.programText: E = data('k8s.pod.phase', filter=filter('k8s.pod.name', 'cilium-dnsproxy-*') and (filter('k8s.pod.phase', 'Pending') or filter('k8s.pod.phase', 'Failed') or filter('k8s.pod.phase', 'Unknown'))).count().publish(label='DNS Proxy not running', color='purple')

options.markdown: Cilium Pod Restarts

chart.name: Operator not Running
chart.programText: C = data('k8s.pod.phase', filter=filter('k8s.pod.name', 'cilium-operator-*') and (filter('k8s.pod.phase', 'Pending') or filter('k8s.pod.phase', 'Failed') or filter('k8s.pod.phase', 'Unknown'))).count().publish(label='Operator not running', color='orange')

chart.description: Tracks the running state of Cilium Pods such as the Agent and the Operator.
chart.name: Cilium Pod Running State
chart.programText:
A = data('k8s.pod.phase', filter=filter('k8s.pod.name', 'cilium-*') and (filter('k8s.pod.phase', 'Pending') or filter('k8s.pod.phase', 'Failed') or filter('k8s.pod.phase', 'Unknown'))).count().publish(label='Agent not running', color='red')

B = data('k8s.pod.phase', filter=filter('k8s.pod.name', 'cilium-*') and filter('k8s.pod.phase', 'Running')).count().publish(label='Agent running', color='green')

C = data('k8s.pod.phase', filter=filter('k8s.pod.name', 'cilium-operator-*') and (filter('k8s.pod.phase', 'Pending') or filter('k8s.pod.phase', 'Failed') or filter('k8s.pod.phase', 'Unknown'))).count().publish(label='Operator not running', color='orange')

D = data('k8s.pod.phase', filter=filter('k8s.pod.name', 'cilium-operator-*') and filter('k8s.pod.phase', 'Running')).count().publish(label='Operator running', color='blue')

E = data('k8s.pod.phase', filter=filter('k8s.pod.name', 'cilium-dnsproxy-*') and (filter('k8s.pod.phase', 'Pending') or filter('k8s.pod.phase', 'Failed') or filter('k8s.pod.phase', 'Unknown'))).count().publish(label='DNS Proxy not running', color='purple')

F = data('k8s.pod.phase', filter=filter('k8s.pod.name', 'cilium-dnsproxy-*') and filter('k8s.pod.phase', 'Running')).count().publish(label='DNS Proxy running', color='yellow')

options.markdown: Cilium Pod Running State

chart.name: Max CNI Add Latency
chart.programText:
A = data('cilium_api_limiter_processing_duration_seconds', 
           filter=filter('api_call', 'endpoint-create') and
                  filter('value', 'mean')).max().publish(label='Max CNI Add Latency')

chart.name: Max CNI Delete Latency
chart.programText:
A = data('cilium_api_limiter_processing_duration_seconds', 
           filter=filter('api_call', 'endpoint-delete') and
                  filter('value', 'mean')).max().publish(label='Max CNI Delete Latency')

chart.name: Max CNI Error Rate
chart.programText: A = data('cilium_api_limiter_processed_requests_total', filter=filter('api_call', 'endpoint*') and filter('outcome', 'fail'), rollup='rate').sum().max().publish(label='Max CNI Error Rate')

chart.name: Max CNI Delete Latency
chart.programText: A = data('cilium_api_limiter_processing_duration_seconds', filter=filter('api_call', 'endpoint-delete') and filter('value', 'mean')).max().publish(label='Max CNI Delete Latency')

chart.name: Max CNI Add Latency
chart.programText: A = data('cilium_api_limiter_processing_duration_seconds', filter=filter('api_call', 'endpoint-create') and filter('value', 'mean')).max().publish(label='Max CNI Add Latency')

chart.name: Max CNI Error Rate
chart.programText: A = data('cilium_api_limiter_processed_requests_total', filter=filter('api_call', 'endpoint*') and filter('outcome', 'fail'), rollup='rate').sum().max().publish(label='Max CNI Error Rate')

chart.name: Cluster IPv4 IPAM Utilization
chart.programText:
capacity = data('cilium_ipam_capacity', filter('family', 'ipv4')).sum()

used = data('cilium_ip_addresses', filter('family', 'ipv4')).sum()

utilization = (used / capacity * 100).publish(label='IPv4 IPAM Utilization %')

chart.name: Bottom-K Node Capacity IPv4
chart.programText:
A = data('cilium_ipam_capacity', filter=filter('k8s.namespace.name', 'kube-system') and filter('family', 'ipv4')).sum(by=['k8s.node.name']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('cilium_ip_addresses', filter=filter('k8s.namespace.name', 'kube-system') and filter('family', 'ipv4')).sum(by=['k8s.node.name']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (A-B).sum(by=['k8s.node.name']).bottom(count=3).publish(label='C')

chart.name: Kubernetes Client API Rate Limiter Latency
DNS Proxy Upstream Reply Seconds Duration
DNS Proxy Upstream Reply Seconds Duration
chart.programText:
A = data('cilium_proxy_upstream_reply_seconds_bucket', rollup='delta').percentile(pct=50, by=['le', 'protocol_l7']).publish(label='A')
B = data('cilium_proxy_upstream_reply_seconds_bucket', rollup='delta').percentile(pct=95, by=['le', 'protocol_l7']).publish(label='B')

chart.name: Cilium Agent CPU Runtime Latency
chart.programText:
A = histogram('go_sched_latencies_seconds', filter=filter('k8s.pod.name', 'cilium-*')).percentile(pct=95, by=['k8s.pod.name']).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='A', enable=False)
C = histogram('go_sched_latencies_seconds', filter=filter('k8s.pod.name', 'cilium-*')).percentile(pct=50, by=['k8s.pod.name']).percentile(pct=50).publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = (A*100).publish(label='D')
E = (C*100).publish(label='E')

chart.name: Cilium Agent CPU Runtime Latency (P50)
chart.programText:
A = histogram('go_sched_latencies_seconds', filter=filter('k8s.pod.name', 'cilium-*')).percentile(pct=50, by=['k8s.pod.name']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = (A*100).top(count=3).publish(label='B')

chart.name: Cilium Agent Container CPU Utilization
chart.programText:
A = data('container.cpu.usage', filter=filter('k8s.namespace.name', 'kube-system')).rate(by=['k8s.pod.name']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
C = data('container.cpu.usage.total').publish(label='C', enable=False)
B = (A).top(count=3).publish(label='B')
D = data('container.cpu.usage.total').publish(label='D', enable=False)

chart.name: Egress Policy Verdict Rate by Match
Egress Policy Verdict Rate by Action
Ingress Policy Verdict Rate by Match
Ingress Policy Verdict Rate by Action
Current Egress Policy Verdict Rate Per Minute

publishLabelOptions.displayName: Policy Verdicts by Source and Destination
publishLabelOptions.label: Policy Verdicts by Source and Destination

chart.programText: data('hubble_policy_verdicts_total', filter=filter('direction','egress')).mean(over='1m').sum(by=['destination_namespace', 'destination', 'source_namespace', 'source', 'match','action']).scale(60).publish(label='Policy Verdicts by Source and Destination')

chart.name: Current ingress Policy Verdict Rate Per Minute

publishLabelOptions.displayName: Policy Verdicts by Source and Destination
publishLabelOptions.label: Policy Verdicts by Source and Destination

chart.programText: data('hubble_policy_verdicts_total', filter=filter('direction','ingress')).mean(over='1m').sum(by=['destination_namespace', 'destination', 'source_namespace', 'source', 'match','action']).scale(60).publish(label='Policy Verdicts by Source and Destination')

dashboard.name: High-Level Health

dashboard.name: CNI (Pod Scheduling)
